dlentry.dt: Question: Why do I need Oxygen Feedback?
dlentry.dd: Answer: It gives your customers a voice as well as an affective way for you to interact with them. It provides your customers with a fast and simple way to offer feedback or ask questions and it provides you with a very efficient system for responding, moderating comments, and managing the comment system.

dlentry.dt: Question: Is Oxygen XML Editor/Author required to use Oxygen Feedback?
dlentry.dd: Answer: No. You can use Oxygen XML Editor/Author or the Oxygen XML WebHelp plugin to integrate into WebHelp documentation, but it can also be embedded on any HTML-based webpage.

dlentry.dt: Question: Do I need my own server to manage and integrate Oxygen Feedback?
dlentry.dd: Answer: No. While this might be a beneficial feature in upcoming releases, there will be cloud-based options for administering without the need for your own server.

dlentry.dt: Question: Is there a demo or trial version for an administrator so that I can add Oxygen Feedback to my website and see it in action?
dlentry.dd: Answer: Yes. For the initial demo release, you can try for free. For more details, go to: .

dlentry.dt: Question: Can I decide which comments posted by my customers are displayed?
dlentry.dd: Answer: Yes. There is an option that specifies whether or not comments are moderated and if that option is enabled, all new or edited comments require approval from an Administrator or Moderator.
